abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &QLDB; with an &AWS; SDK.

chapter.para: The following code examples show how to use &QLDB; with an &AWS; software development kit (SDK).

variablelist.para: The examples are divided into the following categories:

listitem.para: Code excerpts that show you how to call individual service functions.

chapter.para: For a complete list of &AWS; SDK developer guides and code examples, see . This topic also includes information about getting started and details about previous SDK versions.

abstract.para: The following code examples show how to use &QLDB; with &AWS; SDKs.

section.para: The following code examples demonstrate how to perform individual &QLDB; actions with &AWS; SDKs. These excerpts call the &QLDB; API and are not intended to be run in isolation. Each example includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code in context.
The following examples include only the most commonly used actions. For a complete list, see the &QLDB; API Reference.

info.title: Create a &QLDB; ledger using an &AWS; SDK

abstract.para: Create a &QLDB; ledger using an &AWS; SDK

note.para: The source code for these examples is in the &AWS; Code Examples GitHub repository. Have feedback on a code example? Create an Issue in the code examples repo.

section.para: For a complete list of &AWS; SDK developer guides and code examples, see . This topic also includes information about getting started and details about previous SDK versions.
